Text: Inc. increased its stake in RR Donnelley & Sons by 258.6% in the second quarter. Inc. now owns 374,722 shares of the business services provider's stock valued at $738,000 after purchasing an additional 270,222 shares in the last quarter. Point72 Hong Kong Ltd bought a new stake in RR Donnelley & Sons in the second quarter valued at approximately $34,000.
